EmailTemplate.name: Email Template for GoDirectTrade Issue
EmailTemplate.subject: Inquiry Confirmation - {!Case.CaseNumber} {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We're glad to hear from you!
Thanks for contacting GoDirectTrade Support. We've already started working on your "{!Case.Subject}" inquiry. Here's your unique tracking number: {!Case.CaseNumber}.
We'll connect all of your inquiry details through the subject line of this email. So, please leave the subject line unchanged, should you reply, to make sure your response is routed immediately to this case.
